name: Eternal Flame
dialogs: The flame has burned for over a thousand years without fail.
Its light protected us from the darkness that lurks beyond.
Without it, we're vulnerable to forces we've long forgotten.
The phoenix essence glows with pure, eternal fire.
These starlight crystals contain the power of distant suns.
The Eternal Flame burns bright once more! Hope is restored.
Its protective light will shield us from the darkness again.
